entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being angry with Hermione because his Firebolt was taken away for anti-jinx tests.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as trying to do what's best, but her actions have consequences.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is furious with Hermione for stripping down his brand-new Firebolt.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: The Firebolt is described as a brand-new broom that was taken away for anti-jinx tests.

entities.name: gryffindor tower
entities.description: Gryffindor Tower is mentioned as becoming crowded and noisy again after the rest of the school returned.

relationships.description: Harry was the owner of the Firebolt for a few short hours.
Hermione's actions led to Harry losing his Firebolt.
Ron was also the owner of a brand-new Firebolt that Hermione stripped down.
Harry is angry with Hermione for taking his Firebolt away.
